website_summaries.verdict: A weekly calendar with a colorful design.
pros: Weekly detachable pages allow for detailed daily notes
We love the designs that change month-to-month
Its light weight makes it easy to hang from a wall
This is a calendar for a planner with a busy schedule
cons: Pages come off without much resistance

customer_reviews.title: it is what it is....a desk calendar that tears off weekly
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, but it works. Can't really use it for records as the pages tear off weekly. Nice and big though; lots of room to write. (or as my 4 year old prefers....to draw and color!!)
customer_reviews.author: akmom09

customer_reviews.title: and I like the variety of colorful pages
customer_reviews.text: This is just as advertised, and I like the variety of colorful pages. It's a little bigger than I expected, but I hadn't read the dimensions that are clearly placed in the description. It's a very cute pad. I'll use it for my weekly menus.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Cook

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to fit the space I wanted on my desk, plus love the designs on each page.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Different calendar layout leaving more than ample space for daily notes. Packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.author: SCHHCA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love that the calendar is weekly instead of monthly. Gives me more room to take daily notes
customer_reviews.author: The Goode's

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Using it for listing prep at work for my employees, has been perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Summerfield

customer_reviews.title: Great Weekly Calendar
customer_reviews.text: I have been using weekly calendars for years to keep our busy family organized. . This is the first one that has the dates on it, which is so helpful! The dates started on the week I ordered it! I also like that it a whole year's length I really like this calendar.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Laude

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Served it's purpose and is the perfect size for protecting my desk when I need to write.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B

customer_reviews.title: Love this calendar
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar!! So great for my kids to keep their homework and activities in one organized place! The size is great for writing everything they need to do!
customer_reviews.author: dpost123

customer_reviews.title: I did not notice when i purchased this was a ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not notice when i purchased this was a weekly calendar. So if looking for a monthly calendar this is not the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for planning our weekly schedule, and fast shipping! Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sossamon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the weekly desk calendar. Perfect for showing our entire family's schedule.
customer_reviews.author: LorenMarie

customer_reviews.title: Good desktop calendar- pages rip off week by week.
customer_reviews.text: Nice big spaces on which to write- fast delivery. Important to know that pages rip off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the days are laid out, and I find it very useful to keep track of my tasks at work.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this calendar. Plenty of space for everything I need
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice paper. Not too thin. Great size and live that it changes the boarder design monthly!
customer_reviews.author: D. Saieed

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, to have weekly and still see month
customer_reviews.text: Very nice,to have weekly and still see month. Good size for desk
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: the pages come off too easily.
customer_reviews.text: Large pages & lots 0f room to write.However, the pages come off too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Weekly Desk Calendar 2018 or Wall Calendar 2018-11x17 Assorted Patterns (Runs from Now Through December 2018)
product_meta.description: This medium sized 11x17 Weekly Desk Calendar 2018 offers unique, colorful patterns each week. With thick paper, perforated tear away sheets & hole punches for wall hanging, this 2018 Desk Calendar will be a perfect fit for your home or office. View your entire week at a glance!
feature_bullets: 58 WEEKS - Dated Weekly Calendar Desk Pad runs from NOW through December 2018.
UNIQUE DESIGNS EACH WEEK- 12 patterns rotate throughout calendar year. Each page tears away easily.
THICK PAPER - Prevents bleed-through with markers.
12 UNIQUE DESIGNS rotate throughout calendar year.
HOLE PUNCHED - Can be hung on the wall or used on your desk.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
